cells.title: Image Editor
cells.text: 非常实用的一个图片处理插件。是 Figma 自带的图片处理的升级版。
cells.text-en: Manipulate an image with many different color adjustments and filters
cells.author: Pavel Laptev

cells.title: Organiser
cells.text: 非常实用的一个小插件，之前也介绍过类似的，将选中的元素按照相同的间距排整齐。
cells.text-en: Select some layers, run the plugin, set your spacing, hit organise.
cells.author: Luis Ouriach

cells.title: Morph
cells.text: 快速创建霓虹、Glitch、玻璃等效果。相当于Photoshop 里的预设样式。
cells.text-en: Create awesome effects like Skeuomorph, Neon, Glitch, Reflection, Glass, etc. right in Figma!
cells.author: Milan Maheshwari

cells.title: Layer Styles
cells.text: 和 Morph 有一点点类似，不过思路不一样。这个插件是将用户的样式储存起来，方便后续复用。
cells.text-en: Save and apply style presets, including strokes, fills, corner radius, effects, padding, layout grids, layer opacity and blend modes.
cells.author: Gavin McFarland

cells.title: Export Presets
cells.text: 很实用，一些导出的预设，也可以创建一组导出设置，然后存起来以后用。
cells.text-en: Create and automatically apply custom Export Settings. Share them across your files and projects. Including default presets for the most popular platforms.
cells.author: Mirko Santangelo

cells.title: Easing Gradients
cells.text: 通过可视化地调整 Bezier 曲线，来帮助创建更平滑的渐变。
cells.text-en: Allows smoothing of gradient fills in Figma using custom cubic-bézier or step easing functions (think of transition easing). This is especially useful when dealing with transparent gradients but also allows for creative exploration.
cells.author: Alexander Widua

cells.title: Crafttor
cells.text: 和 Blush 类似的插图平台插件，目前只有五套。
cells.text-en: Crafttor's sole purpose is to give digital craftsmen a better tool to create awesome products. We want every creator of the world, create anything without any blocker to their creative thoughts.
cells.author: Plugin Crafttor

cells.title: The good line-height
cells.text: 如果你想要将文字的 type scale 刚好在以4或者任何其他倍数的基线网格上，那么这个插件可以试一下，它可以帮你按照这个倍数确定行高。
cells.text-en: Have you ever needed to create a type scale following an 8 point baseline grid, or really any grid, and had to spend extra time figuring out what should be the right line-height for every text size in the scale?
cells.author: Fran Perez

cells.title: Viewst
cells.text: 一个在线的动态广告 baner 设计工具，这个插件就是将素材导到本地，然后上传到它们的工具中使用。
cells.text-en: Design banners and other creative ads with a smart online app
cells.author: Viewst

cells.title: Batch Image Editor
cells.text: 批量处理导入的图片的滤镜。
cells.text-en: Allows you to batch edit image filters. Pick a selection of images and adjust their exposure, contrast, or saturation in one step.
cells.author: Andrej Bilec

cells.title: StyleList
cells.text: 快速创建初始文字样式和颜色样式，还挺方便的。
cells.text-en: Generate text and color styles quicker and easier way for your projects.
cells.author: Ivan Bannikov

cells.title: CoDesign
cells.text: 腾讯出的类似 Zeplin 的标注协作插件。类似的插件已经好多了，但是在体验上没有哪个能比得上直接在 Figma 上直接查看标注的。
cells.text-en: 由腾讯自研的Figma插件，支持在线导入预览设计稿、自动生成设计标注，批量下载切图素材、灵活调用图标库、素材库。
cells.author: Sa

cells.title: Auto Arrange Frames
cells.text: 将多个 Frame 根据它们在画布上的 x 和 y 的位置，来在图层面板上重新按顺序排布。简单而实用的一个小功能。
cells.text-en: Automatically arrange your frames in the left side layer-list based on their position (x, y) on the canvas.
cells.author: Saurabh Singh

cells.title: Export Image for Native
cells.text: 将图片导出为 Android 或 iOS 需要的预设格式
cells.text-en: Easily Export images of png/jpg/pdf/svg format for Android/iOS.
cells.author: roana0229

cells.title: Name Lint
cells.text: 将文件里的所有未重命名的图层整理出来，然后方便去重新命名。
cells.text-en: An easy way to find and rename all default-named elements in the current page.
cells.author: Richard Guerre

cells.title: Ruri Ruri
cells.text: 又一个创意生成类的插件。可以根据选定的尺寸，颜色等参数来生成。
cells.text-en: Ruri Ruri is an single click artwork generator
cells.author: Klāvs Bušs

cells.title: Sort on Canvas by Name
cells.text: 根据 Frame 的命名来按顺序排布。
cells.text-en: Changes positions of frames, components or other objects on canvas by name.
cells.author: Gleb

cells.title: CSSGen
cells.text: 根据你的本地颜色样式，生成 SASS/LESS。
cells.text-en: Generate CSS Preprocessors SASS/LESS from your local Figma styles
cells.author: Microsoft

cells.title: Subtle Patterns
cells.text: 获取来自 Subtle Patterns 网站上的图案素材。
cells.text-en: Get patterns images from Subtle Patterns
cells.author: Colir

cells.title: Table paste
cells.text: 将表格里的舒服快速复制粘贴到 Figma 中创建好的表格里。
cells.text-en: Paste data from a spreadsheet into styled Figma table rows.
cells.author: Liquidnet Holdings

cells.title: Auto Layout Presets
cells.text: Auto Layout 是 Figma 里非常好用的功能，不过对于刚开始用的人来说，可能会有点烧脑。这个插件提供一些常用的 Auto Layout 预设，帮助你快速用上。
cells.text-en: Apply popular auto-layout presets with a single click.
cells.author: Alex

cells.title: JSON → Content
cells.text: 将 Json 数据填充到设计稿里，如果你想演示你自己项目里的真实数据的时候，这个插件应该用得上。
cells.text-en: Easily map your data and layers together by using the same name. Either select specific entries from your overview or shuffle through them for a randomised dataset
cells.author: Lucas Dietrich

cells.title: Appearance
cells.text: 又一款切换深浅主题的插件。和之前介绍的其他类似插件相比，算是比较轻量级的。
cells.text-en: This plugin generates a dark/light theme from your selection
cells.author: Alex Dyakov

cells.title: Icon Scaling Tool
cells.text: 又一个来自 Microsoft 的插件。创建多尺寸的图标。
cells.text-en: Creating multiple sizes of icons is easy with the Microsoft Design Icon Scaling tool
cells.author: Microsoft

cells.title: Curvature
cells.text: 显示你所画曲线的曲率，可以帮助你画出流畅的曲线。
cells.text-en: Draw the curvature of your vectors.
cells.author: Philip Grefe

cells.title: Squircle
cells.text: 帮助你快速画出 ‘方圆形’——一种介于圆形和方形之间的形状。
cells.text-en: A squircle is an intermediate shape between a square and a circle. This open source plugin allows you to create and edit squircles and superellipses.
cells.author: Scott Dodge

cells.title: Emailify
cells.text: 设计和导出响应式 HTML Email 文件，和之前介绍的 Marka 有点类似。
cells.text-en: Design and export responsive, production ready HTML emails from Figma.
cells.author: Figmatic
